title: Enchanting Neelamani and Diamond Raani Haar
materials: 18K Rose Gold. Features round brilliant cut diamonds (VS clarity
G-H color) and Square cut Sapphire (Neelamani). The gold is meticulously crafted and boasts a fine Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: This stunning necklace reimagines the classic Haar with a contemporary twist. Showcasing a graduated design with alternating sapphire and diamond stations. Graceful diamond-studded pendants dangle below, adding movement and sparkle. The setting is a modern prong and bezel combination that beautifully secures each gemstone. The craftsmanship emphasizes symmetry and balance for a pleasing aesthetic.
colors: contrasted by the brilliant white of the diamonds and the deep blue of the sapphires. This color combination adds a touch of regal elegance.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings
or a sophisticated evening out. This Raani Haar is sure to make a statement at any grand event or gala. Wear this for modern events and classic celebrations
description: This necklace offers a harmonious blend of traditional elegance and contemporary design. It features premium materials and impeccable craftsmanship. The unique combination of sapphires and diamonds makes it a timeless investment. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting brilliance. Its contemporary design elements make it versatile enough for modern events. The diamonds and sapphires, a symbol of royalty.
